results.query: What incident occurred in July 2014?

results.query: What incident occurred in July 2014?
results.answer: In July 2014, while Simone, Ross, and their children had friends over, Ross approached the children playing in the backyard and yelled at them furiously. He then smacked Lachlan and sent him to his room, causing Lachlan to cry hysterically and Mitchell to hide. Their friends immediately left the house, and Ross told Simone, "You embarrassed me in front of our friends. You are a poor parent. You are a failure as a mother and I had to come home to take things in hand. My reaction was perfectly fine."

results.query: What incident occurred in July 2014?
results.answer: In about July 2014, "the children, Ross and I had friends over at our home. The children were playing in the backyard when I saw Ross approach the children and yelled at them furiously. I saw Ross smack Lachlan and sent him to his room. Lachlan was crying hysterically and Mitchell ran away and hid. Our friends left our house immediately and Ross said to me: “You embarrassed me in front of our friends. You are a poor parent. You are a failure as a mother and I had to come home to take things in hand. My reaction was perfectly fine”."

results.query: Did the father ever have suicidal thoughts? If so, when?
results.answer:
The document states that the father, Ross, "suffered depression" following the failure of Prodigy Motorsports in about 2007 (paragraph 53).

results.query: Did the father ever have suicidal thoughts? If so, when?
results.answer:
Yes, the father had suicidal thoughts.

On "15 December 2014 Ross telephoned me at about 7.00am and said: 'I had planned on killing myself on Saturday night. I called lifeline and they told me to give my sleeping pills and Valium to my mother as I was going to use them to kill myself. Mitchell sat on my lap while I was on the phone to lifeline.'"

Additionally, on "16 December 2014 Ross telephone me and told me about his appointment with his Psychologist that afternoon. Ross said: 'I had an extremely well developed plan for self-harm. It’s triggered by my impulse control problems. I’ve been referred to the mental health team. I require a friend to be with me at all times to ensure my triggers and impulse control doesn’t develop into further plans for self harm.'"

results.query: What incident occurred at Lachlan's school in 2016?
results.answer: In 2016, when Lachlan was approaching high school, his school required a formal diagnosis from his psychologist to allow him to be part of a supported transition and social program. However, Lachlan's father, Ross, refused to sign the consent forms for the diagnosis, stating he did not want Lachlan to be "labelled." As a result, a formal diagnosis was not obtained, though a letter from the psychologist was provided to allow Lachlan to access some support at high school.

results.query: What incident occurred at Lachlan's school in 2016?
results.answer: In about the middle of 2016, a meeting occurred at Lachlan's school with "Lachlan’s teacher, the Deputy Principal and Ross at Ross’s request". During this meeting, "Ross demanded that the school make a notification to the Department of Family and Community Services about my care of the children." Additionally, "Lachlan’s teacher recommended that Lachlan should attend upon a Psychologist." Ross also stated, "I won’t let him see the school counsellor because it is a conflict, you work at the school."
